results.title: Enterprise in Nigeria
results.creator_credit: Gerard Holdsworth, Unilever Films and Sydney Latter
results.brief_description: Nigeria, formerly an agricultural country, has a growing range of new industries giving Africans new opportunities and training facilities. With independence the process of industrialisation has accelerated. Shows how the United Africa Company, contributing capital and techniques in many different fields, is playing a part in the rapid development of the country. Traces the growth of industry in all three regions of Nigeria.

results.title: Enterprise
results.brief_description: The film which is in the form of a cartoon in technicolour shows how, at all times and in all ages, industry and commerce have derived their strength from calculated risk taken by shrewd, farsighted and courageous individuals. It begins with a fable about a potter of ancient Egypt whose one-man concern was faded with ruin until it was rescued by the enterprise of its owner. It then advances to the present day when great undertakings are characteristic of the industrial scene. The film shows something of the condition, national and international that brought I.C.I. into being and portrays the structure of the Company from board room to workshop floor.

results.title: Enter the dragon [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Warner Bros Pictures, Concorde Productions, Fred Weintraub, Paul Heller and Robert Clouse
results.brief_description: One of the biggest martial arts epics ever filmed. Bruce Lee, determined to avenge the murder of his sister, enters the island fortress of crime warlord Han. Lee staged his own fighting sequences in the movie and the sequences are thrilling in their timing and execution. ‘Enter the dragon’ was Lee’s last film and his untimely death at a young age, a few weeks after the film’s completion had made this a landmark film of its genre.

results.title: Enter Exit Cave
results.brief_description: Shows the Exit Cave in South-West Tasmania and raises issues concerning the preservation of such sites as part of our heritage. Presents spectacular views of the cave system and its fragile environment. No credits available.

results.title: Enso: El Nino Southern Oscillation
results.brief_description: A very brief and effective diagrammatic explanation of ENSO, or the “El Nino” effect which periodically reverses the normal weather patterns of the Eastern Australian-Indonesian areas and South America. ENSO lasts about a year and weakens the usual easterly trade winds which bring warm air and rainfall so that the rain then falls mid-Pacific.

results.title: Enrolled nurse
results.creator_credit: Philip Aislewood, Basic Films and Margaret Thomson
results.brief_description: A young girl and an older woman with a grown-up family describe the stages of their two-year practical training course, in which they qualified together as State Enrolled Nurses.
